attributes.action: A vote to remove Joe Anderson as major of Liverpool
attributes.additional_details:
Wrote to the FA to complain abut Ross barkleys transfer to Chelsea the same week that a car park went on fire in liverpool and destroyed 1400 cars.

He is willing to fund 2/3 of everton fc new stadium while there is constantly massive cuts to every sectors budget in the city
attributes.background: Joe Anderson hasn't got the city of liverpool best interest in mind he's more concerned with everton football club
